Articles.Content:
The Heimdallr - Program

The "Heimdallr"-Program is a Kerban initiative to savely transport Kerbals into orbit and beyond. All rockets a capable of sending 3 Kerbals to various destinations in space.

All rockets feature multi-stage technology and suppress the advent of space-debris under correct usage.

The "BifrÃƒÂ¶st"-Capsule

Download

All crew is launched inside of an all-purpose, versatile Crew-Vehicle, the BifrÃƒÂ¶st Capsule.

Heimdallr I ver. 1.1.1

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A simple, 2-stage rocket for crew transfers into LKO. It consists out of a BifrÃƒÂ¶st-Capsule launched ontop of an "Ymir I" carrier rocket.

MechJeb ascent path:

  • Orbital Altitude: 75 km
  • Turn Start: 7.5 km
  • Turn End: 65 km
  • Turn Shape: 40%

Action Groups:

[1] Toggle BifrÃƒÂ¶st's Engine

[4] Toggle Launchpad Floodlight

[5] Undock

[6] Open Docking Port

[7] Open Solar Panel

[9] Open Parachute

[0] Remove LES (at ~35km)

Download

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A medium-sized rocket for crew transfers to MÃƒÂ¼n-Orbit. It consists out of a BifrÃƒÂ¶st-Capsule launched ontop of an "Ymir IIA" carrier rocket. Third stage can be crashed into the surface of the MÃƒÂ¼n.

Heimdallr IIB ver. 1.1.0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

A modified "Heimdallr II" rocket with enlarged boosters. It consists out of a BifrÃƒÂ¶st-Capsule launched ontop of an "Ymir IIB" carrier rocket. Needs to be launched into target orbital plane to conserve fuel. Third stage can be crashed into the surface of Minmus.

MechJeb ascent path:

  • Orbital Altitude: 75 km
  • Turn Start: 7.5 km
  • Turn End: 60 km
  • Turn Shape: 50%

Action Groups:

[1] Toggle BifrÃƒÂ¶st's Engine

[4] Toggle Launchpad Floodlight

[5] Undock

[6] Open Docking Port

[7] Open Solar Panel

[9] Open Parachute

[0] Remove LES (at ~35km)

Download

To be continued ...

Edited June 24, 2013 by Spanier

As soon as we get live support I'll create a interplanetary cruise-vessel for this program.

I'll reupload the Loki program within the next days.

Great job! Kind of creepy how similar your command modules are to mine, though I never thought to put linear RCS on my pod. Instead I do sets of 4x RCS on the tank and ASAS to optimize my ability to kill lateral momentum thru translation when landing. If I was paranoid I would suspect you were inside my head... maybe I shouldn't have watched Being John Malkovich last night.

Great job! Kind of creepy how similar your command modules are to mine, though I never thought to put linear RCS on my pod. Instead I do sets of 4x RCS on the tank and ASAS to optimize my ability to kill lateral momentum thru translation when landing. If I was paranoid I would suspect you were inside my head... maybe I shouldn't have watched Being John Malkovich last night.

Puting linear RCS on the pod and therefor away from the tank (and the CoM) presumably increases its torque, I was inspired by the Gemini-Capsule. For optimal translation the capsule could need 2 more RCS-Blocks, but I didn't felt like this would be necessary.

As soon as we get radial drogue-chutes, the capsule will get 2 of them.

Fixed a problem occuring on jettisoning the second stage on Heimdallr II and III.

The second stage is now properly jettisoned.

Heimdallr I now comes in a Stock version, including LES.

The others follow soonish

Have fun!
I like how you used the structural plates to create fairings for the second and third stage engine clusters.
I know updated the rest of the rockets, they now are all Stock!

Great work! Love the capsule design!

I am so stealing your idea to add lights to the launch clamps too!

Really nice designs.

You've just inspired me
